title: Need a Rioter or a Wrenchmen for my issue please: PING
body: I get 12 ping during the day, but when I play at night it spikes to 70 ping which is a huge jump. Can someone help me with this issue please? I am still waiting for my ISP engineers to do work on their end aswell.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is more than likely due there being more people pushing traffic down the line in your area at whatever time of night you attempt to play.

Assuming peak hours of 5-9pm?
I am with NBN, and have unlimited internet package with no peaks, but the times this happens are from 8-10PM anything i can do?
You mentioned you've contacted your ISP already, what have they said?

They are doing network upgrades for 14 days. So need to wait it out. Last one they did was yesterday. So I had 12 ping all day which was beautiful so I think its fixed now :) if not, I'll wait 14 days for the upgrades to finish
Good to know, I would recommend speaking to them further if any issues persist.
